name: Venture Island
description:
Venture Island is a survival FPS that puts you on an Island full of metallic plants and wildlife fully intent on killing you. So far in this current iteration there are only robotic "owls" that fire a devastating laser cannon and destructible landmines (with a iffy hitbox). Soon to come in the next iteration are robotic tigers that pounce on the player. Currently no win condition and enemies do not respawn.

Full Screen for best results

Controls

Movement is WASD keys

Space to Jump

Hold Shift to run
